text: We Are Never Alone () is a 2016 Czech drama film directed by Petr Vaclav. It was selected to be screened in the Contemporary World Cinema section at the 2016 Toronto International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Klaudia Dudová * Zdenek Godla * Miroslav Hanus * Karel Roden * Lenka Vlasáková ==References== ==External links== * Category:2016 films Category:2016 drama films Category:Czech films Category:Czech drama films Category:Czech-language films Category:Golden Kingfisher winners Category:Czech Film Critics' Awards winners
title: We Are Never Alone
